question: Who is the writer of Sitayan, a feminist version of Ramayana analyzing Sita's perspective?
explanation: Award-winning poet, writer and acclaimed teacher Nabanita Deb Sen passed away in her south Kolkata residence on November 7,2019 night after prolonged illness. She was 81 year old. A Sahitya Akademi and Padma Shri awardee, Ms. Deb Sen will be best remembered for her feminist take on the Ramayana, which she has analysed from the perspective of Sita. Her book, Sitayan, was translated into many languages.
